ValidationRule.description: Any products DOT hazardous is a required when Client Type = "OEM" & BRD Type = "Recall" or "Rework"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Client_Type__c ,"OEM"), OR( ISPICKVAL( BRD_Type__c , "Recall"), ISPICKVAL( BRD_Type__c , "Rework") ), ISPICKVAL( Any_products_DOT_hazardous__c ,"") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Any products DOT hazardous is a required when Client Type = "OEM" & BRD Type = "Recall" or "Rework"
